name: Foundation of the Tang Dynasty
description: Li Yuan establishes the Tang Dynasty.

name: Xuanzang's Pilgrimage
description: Xuanzang's journey to India for Buddhist texts.

name: Wu Zetian's Reign
description: Wu Zetian declares herself emperor.

name: An Lushan Rebellion
description: A devastating rebellion led by An Lushan.

name: End of the Tang Dynasty
description: The collapse of the Tang Dynasty.

name: Foundation of the Song Dynasty
description: Emperor Taizu of Song establishes the Song Dynasty.

name: Establishment of the Yuan Dynasty
description: Kublai Khan founds the Yuan Dynasty.

name: Teachings of Confucius
description: Confucius travels across China teaching his philosophy.

name: Philosophical Writings of Lao Tzu
description: Lao Tzu authors the Tao Te Ching, forming the foundation of Taoism.

name: Unification of China under Qin Shi Huang
description: Qin Shi Huang unifies the Warring States into a centralized empire.

name: Founding of the Han Dynasty
description: Liu Bang, known as Han Gaozu, establishes the Han Dynasty.

name: Historical Writings of Sima Qian
description: Sima Qian authors 'Records of the Grand Historian', the first comprehensive history of China.

name: Scientific Contributions of Zhang Heng
description: Zhang Heng develops early seismographs and makes advances in astronomy.

name: Three Kingdoms Period
description: Era marked by the battles of Guan Yu and Cao Cao.

name: Golden Age of Tang Poetry
description: Notable works by poets like Li Bai and Yan Zhenqing.

name: Song Dynasty Reforms
description: Reforms led by Su Shi and Wang Anshi.

name: Establishment of the Ming Dynasty
description: Zhu Yuanzhang founds the Ming Dynasty.

name: Construction of the Forbidden City
description: Initiated by the Yongle Emperor.

name: Reign of Kangxi Emperor
description: Kangxi leads military campaigns and cultural projects.

name: Reign of Qianlong Emperor
description: Qianlong's reign marks a peak in cultural achievements.

name: First Opium War
description: Lin Zexiu's anti-opium efforts lead to conflict with Britain.

name: Taiping Rebellion
description: Hong Xiuquan leads a major rebellion.

name: Efforts to Modernize China
description: Li Hongzhang plays a key role in modernization efforts.
